parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering system can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The power steering light on the dashboard illuminates
the steering wheel becomes difficult to turn
the vehicle is hard to maneuver
and the power steering fails suddenly while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loud squeaking noise from the steering column can be a distraction to the driver, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: A loud squeaking noise is coming from the steering column.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the control arm can cause the vehicle to lose control, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The right front control arm broke in two
causing the vehicle to become disabled.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of the valve stem can cause the tire to lose air, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The valve stem on the wheel had corroded and fell into the tire

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The deterioration of the steering wheel trim can cause the airbag to malfunction, increasing the risk of injuries in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Gaps were developing on either side of the steering wheel hub
and the center panel where the horn and airbag were located was detaching.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of the TPMS valve stems can cause sudden loss of air pressure, leading to tire blowouts, especially at high speeds, which can result in accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Tire pressure warning light comes on
and rapid deflation of the tire.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Inadequate Traction of Goodyear Eagle RS Tires in Snow and Ice
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate traction of the Goodyear Eagle RS tires in snow and ice can cause loss of control, accidents, or near-misses, especially at low speeds.
symptoms: and near-misses in snow and ice conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Wear of Goodyear Eagle RS Tires
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature wear of the Goodyear Eagle RS tires can cause uneven tire wear, reduced traction, and increased risk of tire failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Defective Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) Sensors
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of TPMS sensors can cause sudden and unexpected tire deflation, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: tire valve hex nut breaks off
sudden deflation of tires at high speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Corrosion of TPMS Sensor Valve Stems
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Corrosion of TPMS sensor valve stems can cause sudden and unexpected tire deflation, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: sudden deflation of tires at high speed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Uneven tire wear can lead to reduced tire life, decreased vehicle performance, and increased risk of tire failure.
